lead_paragraph: Europa League champions Sevilla hope to complete the loan signing of Atletico Madrid midfielder Matias Kranevitter this week, the Andalusian club's sporting director said.

headline.print_headline: Atletico's Kranevitter Bound for Sevilla on Loan
headline.main: Atletico's Kranevitter Bound for Sevilla on Loan

snippet: Europa League champions Sevilla hope to complete the loan signing of Atletico Madrid midfielder Matias Kranevitter this week, the Andalusian club's sporting director said....
